translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや待て。行かない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, wait. I'm not going.
"Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かなみ、カモーン」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kanami, come on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、私？　今度は何？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh, me? What is it this time?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わんわんのようにぱたぱたとやって来たかなみに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami came running over, flapping like a puppy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはごにょごにょと耳打ちする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Rance whispered something to her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁー……なるほどね。ん、了解」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haa... I see. Okay, got it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス様……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Rance...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さーて、えーと、三日後くらいか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now then, um, about three days from now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その辺で出撃するぞ。準備しとけよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll launch our attack around then. Prepare yourself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現在は魔軍の勢力圏内にある、悪魔回廊。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Currently, the Demon Corridor lies within the realm of the Demon Army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その深い洞窟の入口に、ランス達はたどり着いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others finally reached the entrance of that deep cave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、やっと着いたか。雑魚どもが鬱陶しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, finally made it. Those small fries are annoying."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もしかして、中にまで魔軍の方々がいたり……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Could it be that members of the Demon Army are even inside...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬっ、それは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nnh, that is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはまず無いと思います。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't think that's the case.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんどの魔物より、悪魔のほうが強いですし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demons are stronger than most monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻めこんでも無益な場所ですから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so invading would be pointless."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうか、よしよし。さっさと入るぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see, alright then. Let's get in quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 洞窟の入口に立ちふさがった悪魔が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A demon blocking the cave entrance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達を見つけて慌てふためいていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: noticed Rance and the others and panicked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うええええ！？　自分、また来たん！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uwaaah!? You again!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、変態悪魔。どけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, perverted demon. Move aside."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あかんあかん。通されへん言うてるやろ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No way, no way. I told you, you can't pass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はぜーったいあかんで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Absolutely no passing today."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、またしばかれんと分からんらしいな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, looks like you won't understand unless you get beaten again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの転移魔法は効かないんだぞ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That teleportation magic doesn't work on me, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺かてゲンコツとか嫌やで。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I hate getting punched too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただエロがちょぴっと好きなだけの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm just a peace-loving guy who happens to like a bit of perversion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 平和主義おじさんやねん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ならばさっさと尻尾巻いてエロ本読んでろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then hurry up, tuck your tail and go read your dirty magazines!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……俺もそうしたいけどな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah... I want to do that too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう、立ちっぱとかホンマしんどいわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Standing around like this is seriously exhausting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疲れマラ勃ちっぱなしやっちゅうねん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm worn out and my erection won't go down."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな話はどうでもいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't care about such stories."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあまあ、聞けや兄弟」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, now, listen up, brother."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰が兄弟か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Who's your brother?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今なあ、ネプラカス様が通っとんのよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right now, Lord Neplacas is passing through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見つかったらバラバラにされるで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you're found, you'll be torn to pieces."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーん？　なんだそいつ。悪魔か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Who's that? A demon?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、上位悪魔や。俺よりぜーんぜん上の階級でな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, a high-ranking demon. Way above me in rank,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話とか通じひん。いなくなる明後日まで待ちぃや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so you can't reason with him. Just wait until he leaves the day after tomorrow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リターンデーモンさんより……そこまで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even more than Return Demon... that much..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういう事なら、今日でなくてもいいかもね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's the case, maybe today isn't the right day after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一日や二日で、何が変わるわけでも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One or two days won't change anything..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ダメだ。今日でなくてはダメなのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No. It has to be today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、もう一度言うぞ。通せ。でなければ殺す」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, I'll say it again. Let us pass. If not, I'll kill you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁ……しゃあないなあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah... It can't be helped..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあええわ、通りぃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright then, you may pass."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't think that's the case.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demons are stronger than most monsters,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, perverted demon. Move aside."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あかんあかん。通されへん言うてるやろ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No way, no way. I told you, you can't pass.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はぜーったいあかんで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Absolutely no passing today."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、またしばかれんと分からんらしいな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, looks like you won't understand unless you get beaten again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの転移魔法は効かないんだぞ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That teleportation magic doesn't work on me, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺かてゲンコツとか嫌やで。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I hate getting punched too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただエロがちょぴっと好きなだけの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm just a peace-loving guy who happens to like a bit of perversion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 平和主義おじさんやねん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ならばさっさと尻尾巻いてエロ本読んでろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then hurry up, tuck your tail and go read your dirty magazines!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……俺もそうしたいけどな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah... I want to do that too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう、立ちっぱとかホンマしんどいわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Standing around like this is seriously exhausting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疲れマラ勃ちっぱなしやっちゅうねん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm worn out and my erection won't go down."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな話はどうでもいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't care about such stories."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあまあ、聞けや兄弟」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, now, listen up, brother."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰が兄弟か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Who's your brother?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今なあ、ネプラカス様が通っとんのよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right now, Lord Neplacas is passing through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見つかったらバラバラにされるで」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you're found, you'll be torn to pieces."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーん？　なんだそいつ。悪魔か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Who's that? A demon?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、上位悪魔や。俺よりぜーんぜん上の階級でな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, a high-ranking demon. Way above me in rank,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話とか通じひん。いなくなる明後日まで待ちぃや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so you can't reason with him. Just wait until he leaves the day after tomorrow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リターンデーモンさんより……そこまで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even more than Return Demon... that much..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういう事なら、今日でなくてもいいかもね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's the case, maybe today isn't the right day after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一日や二日で、何が変わるわけでも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One or two days won't change anything..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ダメだ。今日でなくてはダメなのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No. It has to be today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、もう一度言うぞ。通せ。でなければ殺す」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, I'll say it again. Let us pass. If not, I'll kill you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁ……しゃあないなあ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah... It can't be helped..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあええわ、通りぃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright then, you may pass."
